Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
